name: Golf Pool VR
description:
Experience a unique game that combines the challenge of Golf with the rules of Pool! Set in various beautiful and physically realistic environments, GolfPoolVR is a competitive and fun game you can play by yourself or with friends.Key Features:
  • 10 single player levels.
  • 2 player competitive mode.
  • Detailed and immersive environments. Experience the solitude of the moon or the adrenaline rush of a game or two on top of a skyscraper!
  • Accurate physics based gameplay mechanics.
  • 8-Ball Pool rules are currently implemented. Let me know in the discussions which other rules you'd like to see included.
Support Vive,Oculus and WMR.
